Key:
All right. I finished what I was asked to do.
I'm kind of hungry, so I guess I'll go to the
cafeteria.

Oh. If it isn't Itsuka. Here to do some research?
Guess the rumor spread quick.
Research? What are you talking about?

Hm, am I wrong? A new dessert is being sold
this week in the cafeteria?

Girls love sweets after all! I'll do my research,
then spring it into conversation at the best
opportunity.

The only thing I can't compete with you in
is passion. So what's the dessert?

Heh, we all have our strengths. Since we're such
good friends, I'll tell you the secret. Here!

That's right! Cheap and nutritious!
Truly the ideal snack.

There's no mistake that it'll become the topic
of conversation in the cafeteria!

Oops. I can't stay long. I requested the Home
Economics club to revise the soymilk pudding
recipe.

Unless it's a culinary masterpiece, I doubt girls
would flock to it, but... He seems to be having
fun.
